titleStmt.title: A proclamation set furth by the Kinges Maiestie, prohibiting aswel the buyeng or selling, golde, siluer, or coyne, at any higher price then is appoincted, as also the melting doune of the sayd coynes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.

notesStmt.note: At foot of text: Yeouen at our palace of Westminster the. xxi. day of Decembre, the. v. yere of our reigne.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
